requirements_en.minimum: Macbook (early 2009), Macbook Pro (mid 2007), IMac (early 2009), MacMini (early 2009), Mac Pro (early 2009), MacBook Air (late 2008). Recommended two-button mouse, or Apple mouse with Secondary Button / Secondary Click enabled.  Geneforge 1-5 is NOT supported on volumes formatted as Mac OS Extended (Case Sensitive).

Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7, 1.6 GHz Processor, 256MB RAM (512 MBB recommended), 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 (compatible with DirectX 9 recommended), 300 MB HDD, Mouse, Keyboard.
Geneforge 4 and Geneforge 5 require a minimum resolution of 1024 x 768 and are incompatible with netbook resolutions.
Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7, 1.8 GHz Processor, 512MB RAM (1 GB recommended), 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 (compatible with DirectX 9 recommended), 2GB HDD, Mouse, Keyboard.
Windows XP or Windows Vista, 1.8 GHz Processor, 512MB RAM (1 GB recommended), 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 (compatible with DirectX 9 recommended), 2GB HDD, Mouse, Keyboard.

OS X 10.6.8 or later.
